channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Nvidia orders suppliers to halt work on China-focussed H20 AI chip, The Information says
French streamer dies live online during extreme challenge
Erik Menendez denied parole after decades in prison
item.description: California officials have denied Erik Menendez parole after he spent decades in prison for killing his parents in 1989.

item.title: 8/21: The Daily Report
item.description: Jericka Duncan reports on two states' progress in redistricting plans, and the larger impact of rapid climate change in Antarctica.

item.title: U.S. halts issuing worker visas for commercial truck drivers
item.description: The U.S. will stop issuing worker visas for commercial truck drivers, Secretary of State Marco Rubio announced Thursday.

item.title: WATCH: Husband flees to Peru after wife found dead, California police say

item.title: Judge blocks transfer of new detainees to Alligator Alcatraz
item.description: A federal judge is ordering the Trump administration and Florida to effectively wind down operations at the immigrant detention center known as “Allig...

item.title: Edited video shows TikTok staff feared app could be addictive
item.description: Edited video of TikTok company meetings shows employees flagging features they viewed as potentially harmful.

item.title: Erik Menendez denied parole 36 years after murdering his parents
item.description: Erik Menendez was denied parole during his first-ever parole hearing on Thursday, 36 years and one day after he and his brother killed their parents.

item.title: Villanova University says active shooter report was a 'cruel hoax'

item.description: Hurricane Erin lashes Outer Banks with coastal flooding and strong winds; When Mona Lisa was stolen from the Louvre
